original: 18.10. Sahetukaduka, Hetuduka🔽Sahetukaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Ahetukaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: sa hetuka duka hetu duka  sa hetukam hetum dhammam paṭicca na sa hetukaḥ na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  ahetukam hetum dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: The Numerical Series of the Conditions🔽With root-cause as condition, a non-root-cause, a root-cause-and-non-root-cause …🔽With root-cause as condition, a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause …

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe cattāri …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe aññamaññe cattāri pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha
translated: (In brief.) With root-cause as condition, six; with object as condition, three … with kamma as condition, four … with nutriment as condition, three … with faculty as condition, six.

original: Sahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naahetuko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽(Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe
analyzed: sa hetukam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na ahetukaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe pañca adhipatiyā ekam pe sahajāte aññamaññe
translated: With root-cause as condition, a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause …

original: pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: pañca pe purejāte āsevane tīṇi pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pañca
translated: (In brief.) With root-cause as condition, three; with object as condition, five; with predominance as condition, one … with arising together as condition, with presence as condition, five; with non-disappearance as condition, five.🔽With root-cause as condition, a non-root-cause, a non-root-cause …🔽(In brief.) With root-cause as condition, three; with object as condition, five; with predominance as condition, one … with arising together as condition, with presence as condition, five; with non-disappearance as condition, five.
